title: venkata giri vaasA
sahitya:
venkata girivAsA sarvesA!{shrI}
sangaTa harana  shrInivAsA!  

anupallavi

pankaja lOcana paramakrupAkara
mangalAnga mahanIya manOhara 

caraNam

sakala lOka paripAluDu nIvanucu
ika para sukhamulu nirasanamu jEsi
nIpada yugamulu niratamu sEvincu 
nAmoralanu vini nannAdaricu
